answers.answer: it sounds like just BH..they can be very uncomfortable..and to be honest if I was as uncomfortable as you say you were sex would be the last thing on my mind! Lol

Haha I didn't WANT to have sex but everyone keeps telling me it will start labor so I was thinking I would give it a shot but I ended up not anyways. I have been having so many crazy symptoms, light headedness and blurred vision and stuff I called my dr today and he ran some tests for preeclampsia but everything came back normal, I didn't even see the dr just the nurse so I couldn't really ask any questions. I just want to be done! I'm tired of being sooo miserable
I think all of us are done..we are all so anxious to meet our little ones we are willing to try almost anything to meet them!

the last few weeks are definatly the hardest.. on top of all the increased aches and pains of pregnancy your getting more and more impatient resulting in noticing every little thing.im so fed up of the faulse contractions the way i see it is ill know when there real ones i did with my first so im sure they wont be any less painful this time round lol, its also even worse going over due i went 5 days over with lexie and im praying it doesnt happen again but as long as shes healthy i spose its all worth it in the end.just rememember theyve got to come out somtime if its your first enjoy the last few weeks of peace and freedom because once there actually here its all about them ;) and youll be suprised how much you miss being pregnant.

I had the same issue the last time I tried to put out...but that was back in month five or so...kudos to you for even trying to go there at this point LOL! This part is hard, I agree...hang in there, though. The end is in sight...that baby can't cook in there forever :) But I feel ya...I'm 37 weeks, 3 days and it seems like each week I develop some new annoying/painful ailment (i.e. this week, my hips seem to almost pop when I walk at times...very odd...I've almost tripped a few times because it's so random).

question: Okay I woke up this morning with the worst hip pain and lots of pressure. Later this evening my stomach was really sore, not sure if I was having Braxton hicks or if it's just sore and my tummy has been really hard and just feeling super uncomfortable and tired. I was going to have sex because I was thinking maybe if I'm this uncomfortable it will get something going but during foreplay my vagina was really tender and my husband said it was super tight and he couldnt get me wet. I was wondering if anyone else has experienced this or what it might mean? I'm 36 weeks and 6 days
title: TMI post
